registration.title: Register an Endpoint
registration.ssl-error: {{error}}. Please check "Skip SSL validation for the endpoint" if the certificate issuer is trusted.
registration.error: There was a problem creating the endpoint. Please ensure the endpoint address is correct and try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.

unregister.title: Unregister Endpoint
unregister.confirm: Are you sure you want to unregister endpoint '{{name}}'?

connect.title: Provide Credentials
connect.description: You should have received an email from your administrator with credentials for endpoints you have access to. Please contact your administrator for help.
connect.error-no-connect: The authentication server failed to respond. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.
connect.error-server-failure: A server error occurred when attempting to register your service. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.
connect.error-user-input: The username and password combination you used are incorrect. Please try again.

errors.unavailable: The Console could not contact the endpoint named '{{name}}'. Try reconnecting to this endpoint to resolve this problem.
errors.multiple: The Console could not contact multiple endpoints
errors.contact: The Console could not contact this endpoint. Try reconnecting to this endpoint to resolve this problem.
errors.expired: Token has expired. Try reconnecting to this endpoint to resolve this problem.
